actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow for the deductibility of certain local service charges when imposed in lieu of real property taxes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to treat municipal service charges for garbage collection or street lighting as deductible real property taxes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow for the deductibility of certain local service charges when imposed in lieu of real property taxes.
